metadata.title: Inteli Camp - Inteli - Institute of Technology and Leadership
metadata.description: Discover Inteli Camp, Inteli's vacation program for 9th grade and high school students. Explore the digital world, learn programming, UX, AI and entrepreneurship, and build relevant projects. Sign up now!

content_blocks.text: A 5-day immersion for students from the 9th to the 3rd year of high school to develop solutions integrating technology and business.
What is Inteli Camp?

At Inteli Camp, students have the opportunity to live a transformative experience: building real technology projects, working in groups and facing challenges that develop skills and drive the creation of solutions for the future.
Technology Track

Discover how to use artificial intelligence tools to understand what people are feeling on social networks. Learn how to find patterns, interpret information in a simple way and turn it all into creative solutions. You'll also take your first steps in programming and learn how to create graphics that tell stories!

Discover how to use artificial intelligence tools to understand what people are feeling on social networks. Learn how to find patterns, interpret information in a simple way and turn it all into creative solutions. You'll also take your first steps in programming and learn how to create graphics that tell stories!

- Sentiment analysis in social content
- Data extraction and emotional patterns
- Visualization and interpretation of results
Use modern tools to extract valuable insights
content_blocks.subsection: Use modern tools to extract valuable insights

content_blocks.text: Develop projects in multidisciplinary teams
Entrepreneurship Track

Discover business opportunities based on the emotions of the public on social networks. Learn to interpret reports, turn insights into business models and create value propositions. Develop strategies to boost brand growth using your own analysis.

Discover business opportunities based on the emotions of the public on social networks. Learn to interpret reports, turn insights into business models and create value propositions. Develop strategies to boost brand growth using your own analysis.

- Identifying market opportunities
- Developing data-driven strategies
- Creating and presenting value propositions
Why take part?
Application of AI tools
Learn how to use artificial intelligence tools to understand how people feel on social networks
Data Interpretation
Develop the ability to extract valuable insights from large volumes of information
Business Strategies
Turn feelings and trends into strategies that make brands really grow Develop collaboration and communication skills in multidisciplinary teams
Innovative Thinking
Stimulate your creativity and problem-solving skills through technology
Effective communication
Learn to present ideas and results clearly and persuasively
Testimonials
Find out about the experiences of previous Inteli Camp participants
Yan Kruziski

"What an enriching experience! As well as making friends that I'll carry with me for life, the conversations with the development and leadership center were crucial in giving me direction in my professional life. The practical skills I acquired were fundamental to the development of my individual projects and, to my surprise, ended up bringing me recognition in university classes."
Sara Sbardelotto
"It allowed me to experience project methodology in practice and to have my first contact with programming, which also helped in my decision to study Computer Engineering at Inteli later on."
Felipe Lisak
"Taking part in the entrepreneurship track at Inteli Camp 2024 was transformative: I learned more in a week than in months of theory."
See how the 2024 edition went!
Who can take part?
Students from the 9th grade to the 3rd year of high school
content_blocks.subsection: Students from the 9th grade to the 3rd year of high school

content_blocks.text: No previous experience necessary
Curious minds interested in innovation
Program structure
5 days of total immersion
Presentation of the challenge, team formation and introduction to the concepts of social network analysis.
Main activities:

Main activities:

- Presentation of the challenge
- Team formation
- Introduction to data analysis
- First ideas and brainstorming
Deepening the analysis tools and developing the first strategies.
Main activities:

Main activities:

- Workshops on the tools used
- Identifying opportunities
- First analyses of the data collected
- Creating the solution concept
Start building the MVP (Minimum Viable Product) and doing the first tests.
Main activities:

Main activities:

- Building the MVP (Minimum Viable Product)
- Initial validation
- Implementing the tools
- Adjustments based on feedback
Adjusting the MVP and starting to prepare for the final presentation.
Main activities:

Main activities:

- Adjusting the developed solution
- Preparing the presentation
- Tests and final adjustments
- Presentation rehearsals
Presentation of the projects to an evaluation panel, feedback and prizes for the best teams.
Main activities:

Main activities:

- Final adjustments to the presentation
- Feedback from experts
- Presentation to the evaluation board
- Awards and closing
Investment for its evolution:
R$2,490.00 cash on delivery
or up to 4x without interest
Are you from outside São Paulo?
content_blocks.subsection: Are you from outside São Paulo?

content_blocks.text: With your convenience in mind, we've put together some suggestions for accommodation near Inteli to make it easier for you to take part inInteli Camp 2025. Check them out:
